factfinderWebComponentsListing.label: Typical collection of Web Components that implements search result page

config.callbackArg: Name of argument which will be available inside the callback scope
config.callback: callback to the subscribed topic. It is recommended to have only one callback per topic, per page.
config.domUpdated: listener to dom-update event of that element.
config.id: Value will be passed as `id` attribute to element. If not specified, the default CMS element id will be used

config.callbackArg: Name of argument which will be available inside the callback scope
config.callback: callback to the subscribed topic. It is recommended to have only one callback per topic, per page.
config.domUpdated: listener to dom-update event of that element.
config.id: Value will be passed as `id` attribute to element. If not specified, the default CMS element id will be used
config.topic: Leaving this field empty causes element subscribe to its default topic (asn)
config.vertical: Setting to true will add additional CSS class `btn-block` to the `ff-asn-group` and `<div slot="groupCaption"` and ffw-asn-vertical, ffw-asn-group-vertical and ffw-asn-group-element-vertical to corresponding elements

campaigns.label: FACT-Finder® Web Components campaigns elements collection

config.leaveFreeIfNotSpecified: Leave this value free if you want page to accept all campaigns matching the criteria
